com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.data_services

Interface IStorageService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataServiceProvider, IUnderlyingService

    public interface IStorageService
extends IUnderlyingService, IDataServiceProvider
    The interface for the storage service
    Author:
    alex

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IStorageService.StorageStage
      The storage service retains data from 0-3 different stages of the processing: "raw" - is the unprocessed data, "json" is the data after serialization but otherwise untouched (eg before enrichment/analytics), "processed" is post-processing/analytics "transient_output" - for analytic engines, temporary storage shared between jobs within an analytic thread (and with external analytic threads) "transient_input" - the input directory for the bucket - allows buckets to write to inputs of other buckets directly

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.shared_services.IDataServiceProvider

        IDataServiceProvider.IGenericDataService

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BUCKET_SUFFIX
      The system is only interested in files under this sub-directory of each bucket path
      static String EX_PRIMARY_BUFFER_SUFFIX
      A recommended secondary name for the optional "original primary" if it is moved to the secondary
      static Optional<String> LOCAL_FS
      Can be used with getUnderlyingPlatformDriver(FileContext, LOCAL_FS) to return a local FS (that knows about the remote one ie can be safely used to pass data around)
      static String NO_TIME_SUFFIX
      This suffix is where data is placed if there are no temporal considerations
      static String PRIMARY_BUFFER_SUFFIX
      The suffix (included in other constants unless otherwise specified) that points to the current set of data where there are multiple buffers (eg for ping/pong type operations)
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX
      This is the top level directory for data that has actually been processed
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_JSON
      For non JSON input files (CSV/binary), the data immediately after it has been converted to JSON but before any other enrichment has occurred (It is not expected that this directory will be commonly used) (Batch only)
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_JSON_SECONDARY
      For non JSON input files (CSV/binary), the data immediately after it has been converted to JSON but before any other enrichment has occurred (It is not expected that this directory will be commonly used) (where secondary buffers are stored) (Batch only)
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_PROCESSED
      Data from batch or streaming data after all enrichment has occurred
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_PROCESSED_SECONDARY
      Data from batch or streaming data after all enrichment has occurred (where secondary buffers are stored)
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_RAW
      This is the directory where the raw data is stored (ie copied from the /ready/ directory without being changed) (Batch only)
      static String STORED_DATA_SUFFIX_RAW_SECONDARY
      This is the directory where the raw data is stored (ie copied from the /ready/ directory without being changed) (where secondary buffers are stored) (Batch only)
      static String TEMP_DATA_SUFFIX
      This is for temp data, eg for spooling
      static String TO_IMPORT_DATA_SUFFIX
      This is the directory into which the harvester pushes files during batch enrichment
      static String TRANSIENT_DATA_SUFFIX_SECONDARY
      This is for transient data, eg for intermediate analytic steps - data is stored in TRANSIENT_DATA_SUFFIX_SECONDARY + / (where secondary buffers are stored, has no primary string constant because of the job name infix)

      Returns the root path for all Aleph2 DB _bucket_ related activities (use getRootPath for the higher level)

    • Method Detail

      • validateSchema

        scala.Tuple2<String,List<BasicMessageBean>> validateSchema(DataSchemaBean.StorageSchemaBean schema,
                                                           DataBucketBean bucket)
        Validate the schema for this service
        Parameters:
        schema - - the schema to validate
        Returns:
        firstly the storage signature for this bucket, then a list of errors, empty if none

      • getRootPath

        String getRootPath()
        Returns the root path for all Aleph2 DB related activities (use getBucketRootPath for the root of all bucket directories)
        Returns:
        the root path, in a URI that is supported by the underlying file system (see getUnderlyingPlatformDriver)

      • getBucketRootPath

        String getBucketRootPath()
        Returns the root path for all Aleph2 DB _bucket_ related activities (use getRootPath for the higher level)
        Returns:
        the root path, in a URI that is supported by the underlying file system (see getUnderlyingPlatformDriver)
